title: Celery and Stilton soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, diced', '1 head celery, clean and chopped', '2 vegetable stock cubes', '1.2 litres hot water', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '170g Stilton cheese, crumbled', '120ml (1/4 pt) single cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
